channel.title: Making Objects give out Stat xp..?
channel.description:
Ok, so how does this work?
i have based my server in fally, i deleted all "objects" from client.java. but the bank in fally is there? lol
anyway, so how would i change it so it said "Rob Bank" instead of use bank? Also, then once they clicked "rob bank" how would i make it give off some money and theiving xp?
Please post asap, you will be a bigg help.
Thanks in advanced.

item.title: Making Objects give out Stat xp..?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

you cant rename the object unless you have your own client, but i pmed you how to make it add exp
